TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit ModelService extends System.Object

summary.span: 此類別是設計工具用來與模型互動的主要進入點。

span.span: This class is the main entry point that the designer uses to interact with the model.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此服務在公用方法與受保護的方法之間有一個分隔，當您建立衍生類別時，您必須實作這個分隔。The service has a split between public and protected methods that you must implement when you create a derived class. 公開方法可由任何人呼叫。The public methods are callable by anyone. 受保護的方法是由模型叫用。The protected methods are invoked by the model.

summary.span: 當使用者想要建立新的項目時， 會呼叫這個方法。

span.span: This method is called by when the user wants to create a new item.

param.name: type
param.span: 包含參考之靜態成員的型別。

span.span: The type that contains the static member being referenced.

param.name: memberName
param.span: 參考之靜態成員的名稱。

span.span: The name of the static member being referenced.

summary.span: 建立新的模型項目，這個項目表示給定類別的靜態成員值。

span.span: Creates a new model item that represents the value of a static member of the given class.
Returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 例如，若要將 `Brushes.Red` 的參考加入至模型，使用 `typeof(Brushes)` 與字串 "Red" 做為參數，呼叫這個方法。For example, to add a reference to `Brushes.Red` to the model, call this method with `typeof(Brushes)` and the string "Red" as the parameters. 這將會當做 `{x:Static Brushes.Red}`，序列化為 XAML。This will be serialized into XAML as `{x:Static Brushes.Red}`.

summary.span: 從要查看的給定起點尋找相符的模型項目。

span.span: Finds matching model items given a starting point from which to look.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所有查核行程都是遞迴的。All walks are recursive.

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract event EventHandler<System.Activities.Presentation.Services.ModelChangedEventArgs> ModelChanged;
.event class System.EventHandler`1<class System.Activities.Presentation.Services.ModelChangedEventArgs> ModelChanged
Public MustOverride Event ModelChanged As EventHandler(Of ModelChangedEventArgs)
public: abstract event EventHandler<System::Activities::Presentation::Services::ModelChangedEventArgs ^> ^ ModelChanged;

summary.span: 當模型中的項目變更時，會引發此事件。

span.span: This event is raised when something in the model has changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件中的事件引數可用來尋找已變更的項目。The event arguments in the event can be used to find what has changed.

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelItem Root { get; }
.property instance class System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelItem Root
Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property Root As ModelItem
public: abstract property System::Activities::Presentation::Model::ModelItem ^ Root { System::Activities::Presentation::Model::ModelItem ^ get(); };

span.span: The root of the object hierarchy.

value.span: 傳回模型階層的根，做為 。

span.span: Returns the root of the model hierarchy as a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若是線性存放區，根是存放區中的第一個物件。For linear stores, the root is the first object in the store. 若是表示物件樹狀結構的存放區，這會傳回樹狀結構最上方的節點。For stores that represent a tree of objects, this returns the topmost node of the tree.
